api_list.name: Get Arbitrage Trades
api_list.description: Get live crypto arbitrage  trades in JSON format with coin, buy & sell price, exchange names & profit potential.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-arbitrage-scanner1.p.rapidapi.com/arbitrage/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-arbitrage-scanner1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
